typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{$dtid} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		EMT as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		ProcessCycleTm as string,
		TotalNum as string,
		MainProgram as string,
		CycleRunTm as string,
		ProcessStartTm as string,
		EventTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> srccncstatus
srccncstatus sink(input(
		{$dtId} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		ProcessCycleTm as string,
		EventTime as string,
		TotalNum as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		EMT as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		ProcessStartTm as string,
		CycleRunTm as string,
		MainProgram as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['partition-data.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		{$dtId} = {$dtid},
		{$timestamp},
		ProcessCycleTm,
		EventTime,
		TotalNum,
		CreateTime,
		EMT,
		SequentialNumber,
		ProcessStartTm,
		CycleRunTm,
		MainProgram
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PartitionDataSetCDM
